title: How much money does the city charge promoters to use Greenfield Lake Amphitheater for a rock concert?
text:
It depends on what type of event it is and who is sponsoring it, such as a nonprofit or a for-profit business.

HereÍs a link with more details:

http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/Portals/0/documents/Community%20Services/Parks,%20Recreation,%20and%20Downtown%20Services/Amphitheater/GENERAL%20POLICIES%20revision.6.27.13.pdf
